title: Coronavirus briefing: UK testing criticised and Trump warns of 'painful weeks'
description: Your morning briefing for Wednesday 1 April 2020.
content:

UK testing in the spotlight

Criticism has been mounting in the UK over a lack of testing for frontline NHS staff. Up to a quarter of doctors and a fifth of nurses are off work … [+6075 chars]
